purpose.value: Code system used to indicate the type of attachment

display.value: Invalid value
Invalid code
A mandatory input field is missing
Conflicting values
Unexpected field
Invalid Request Type
Invalid Request State
Patient Sensitive
No Relationship
FHIR constraint violated
The Filename of one of the files that correspond to the IDs supplied exactly matches (including extension) that of an existing file already associated with the referral.
This field, although expected by the operation, is not applicable in some cases due to business rules.
The file is either empty or too large.
A value, which is acceptable under different conditions, is inappropriate in the context of the other information provided with the request.
e-RS is unable to interpret the provided json as FHIR.
A referenced entity in an invalid state for the operation to proceed.
The current user does not have permission to access one of the entities referenced.
The patient record is missing the access code that is necessary to log onto Manage My Referrals
The selected organisation is marked as closed
The selected organisation is of a type that is not suitable for the operation.
An error occurred while fetching the patient's record from PDS.
An entity referenced in the body of the request is not found when looked up.
A user is not marked as active in SDS.
The referenced user doesn't have the Referring Clinician Role.
The referenced user doesn't have the Service Provider Clinician Role.
The referenced user is not in the required organisation.
A service proposed for shortlisting is not compatible with the search criteria.
A SNOMED code, while potentially valid in the latest version of the international dictionary, is not found in the e-RS copy of the dictionary.
Too many items have been provided in an array or list.
This fields, although defined as optional, is required in specific cases due to business rules.
The file is currently being scanned and cannot be retrieved.
The file has been quarantined as a threats has been detected, the file cannot be retrieved.
The file has failed validation.

definition.value: Reasons for this include: the file type provided is not supported or does not correlate with the file extension; the file is too large

display.value: An issue occurred whilst attempting to authorise a request
